response.explain: The previous action code has successfully turned on the oven to heat the pork chop. There is no error in the execution. The next step is to wait for the pork chop to be cooked.
response.subtask:
(1) Put the pork chop in the oven
(2) Turn on the oven to heat the pork chop
(3) Wait for the pork chop to be cooked
(4) Take the heated pork chop out of the oven
(5) Put the heated pork chop on the plate
